author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1938 Added instrumentation to optionally force JVM to dump the stack

author: fdmanana
msg: Proper verification of the request's accepted media types. Uses the new function mochiweb_request:accepts_content_type/1.

author: fdmanana
msg: Backporting issue 21 from the official Mochiweb repository:
correctly determining (as specified by RFC2616) if a request accepts a specific media type for the Content-Type of the response.
